itemDesc: Armor-piercing rocket-propelled grenade designed to penetrate armored vehicles. Effective against tanks and lightly fortified targets.
Advanced rocket-propelled grenade with improved penetration mechanics, commonly used by emplaced and heavy anti-tank launchers.
Standard rocket-propelled grenade used by infantry anti-tank launchers. Effective against vehicles and light structures.
A high-impact missile designed to shatter fortifications and heavily damage armored targets through explosive force.
